quotes.quote: You can only come to the morning through the shadows.
The morning was full of sunlight and hope.
Who will tell whether one happy moment of love or the joy of breathing or walking on a bright morning and smelling the fresh air, is not worth all the suffering and effort which life implies.
A morning is a wonderful blessing, either cloudy or sunny. It stands for hope, giving us another start of what we call Life. Good morning & have a nice day.
Life begins each morning.
The silence in the morning holds lots of expectations and is more hopeful than the silence at night.
Waking up this morning, I smile. Twenty-four brand new hours are before me. I vow to live fully in each moment.
What a benediction is this fragrance of the early morning! The vernal grass fills the whole atmosphere as with a shower of sweetness.
When you have to get into the character each morning, give it your voice, your face, it was torture.
I arise in the morning torn between a desire to improve the world and a desire to enjoy the world. This makes it hard to plan the day.
So fine was the morning except for a streak of wind here and there that the sea and sky looked all one fabric, as if sails were stuck high up in the sky, or the clouds had dropped down into the sea.
Up at dawn, the dewy freshness of the hour, the morning rapture of the birds, the daily miracle of sunrise, set her heart in tune, and gave her nature's most healing balm.

The moment when you first wake up in the morning is the most wonderful of the twenty-four hours. No matter how weary or dreary you may feel, you possess the certainty that, during the day that lies before you, absolutely anything may happen. And the fact that it practically always doesn't, matters not a jot. The possibility is always there.
I hope you wake up feeling exeptional. You are important, needed, and unique.

Everyday, think as you wake up, today I am fortunate to be alive, I have a precious human life, I am not going to waste it. I am going to use all my energies to develop my self, to expand my heart out to others.
Morning is an important time of day, because how you spend your morning can often tell you what kind of day you are going to have.

It is in the early morning hour that the unseen is seen, and that the far-off beauty and glory, vanquishing all their vagueness, move down upon us till they stand clear as crystal close over against the soul.
In the morning, before I leave the house, I say five things I love about myself, like â€˜You have really pretty eyes.' That way I can go out into the world with that little bit of extra confidence.
Through the blackest night, morning gently tiptoes, feeling its way to dawn.
Every day I feel is a blessing from God. And I consider it a new beginning. Yeah, everything is beautiful.
I have always been delighted at the prospect of a new day, a fresh try, one more start, with perhaps a bit of magic waiting somewhere behind the morning.
Morning without you is a dwindled dawn.
I can see the orange haze on the horizon as the morning exhales a yawn, and seems to be ready to rise.
These morning practices are what fuel me; keeping my routine is not about willpower.
With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
Morning is when the wick is lit. A flame ignited, the day delighted with heat and light, we start the fight for something more than before.
There is something magical about the early morning. It's a time when the world belongs to only those few who are awake. And we walk around like kings while others remain unseen in their beds.
Eating right and taking the time to slow down and plan in the morning is crucial to a productive day.
Beauty, sweet love, is like the morning dew, whose short refresh upon tender green, cheers for a time, but till the sun doth show and straight is gone, as it had never been.
When I'm tempted to skip my morning routine or another form of self-care, I remind myself that I can better serve the people I love and the projects I care about when I start with me.
